divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving home from 7springs resort approximately at 7:15 on route 982 when I witnessed 3 red ligts that formed a huge triangle. Thought it was a tower at first. Object was hovering over head but seemed to be following me. Too slow to be an airplane. It slowly vanished out of sight. No sound. I'm pretty sure a Cessna or some small plane witnessed it as well. Possibly plane was departing nearby Arnold Palmer regional airport
